skillTree.localised_description: No creation is ever perfect in Shi-Hongâ€™s mind, and so he continues to improve upon his constructs, making changes that would be entirely unnoticeable to untrained eyes but offer a cutting edge in battle.
The stockpiles of armaments & rations aboard the Wind of Heaven prove most useful during long sieges.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Leadership: +4 when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Ammunition: +6% during siege defence battles
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -15% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Leadership: +8 when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Ammunition: +12% during siege defence battles
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -20% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Leadership: +12 when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Ammunition: +18% during siege defence battles
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.localised_description: A stock of ordnance made from a variety of different elements and substances, even warpdust, that Shi-Hong is eager to test in the field.

effects.description:
Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence) for all Artillery & Sky-junks
	(Hero's army)

Enables "Blinded" contact effect (reduced Accuracy, Melee Attack and Melee Defence) for all Artillery & Sky-junks
	(Hero's army)

Enables "Burnt" contact effect (reduced leadership) for all Artillery & Sky-junks
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +15% for artillery units
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The wonder of the Celestial Army, the Kongming Sky-junk is perhaps the greatest creation of Nan-Gauâ€™s War-Artificer.

effects.description:
Recruitment Cost: -15% for Sky-junk units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for Sky-junk units
	(accompanying Lord)

Recruitment Cost: -25% for Sky-junk units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Sky-junk units
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Master Shi-Hong is irritable when interrupted mid-calibrations, but thanks to this intense focus, his weaponry are far simpler to reload and certain to hit their mark.
Shi-Hong distributes his own forged ammunition to warriors who cannot easily access high-quality projectiles.
Augmentations made to the Sky-junk allow it to carry more explosives safely to battle.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +25% for Sky-junk units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Despite his disability, Shi-Hong has worked tirelessly to earn his place as Nan-Gauâ€™s Grand Artificer. Now, countless generals and artificers flock to Shi-Hong in the hopes that he will contribute his insight to their own designs.

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Sky Lanterns & Sky-junks (minimum 1)
	(all armies factionwide)

Upkeep: -15% for all Artillery units
	(all armies factionwide)

Recruitment duration: -2 turn for Sky Lanterns & Sky-junks (minimum 1)
	(all armies factionwide)

Upkeep: -25% for all Artillery units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: A Master Artificer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: If the Grand Artificer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse the demands of the Blind Master.
Artificers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.
Artificers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
Despite his blindness, Shi-Hong can accurately direct his missile to ensure maximum damage.
Master Shi-Hong can oversee dozens of workers in his forges. Likewise, he has no trouble with managing soldiers on the battlefield.
War-Artificers familiar with defensive formations use their decades of experience in sieges.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those Artificers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Death is always just a shot away.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
"The recoil's a nightmare, but you can't deny the end result!"
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Keep your tools on you at all times - you never know when you'll need them.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is always flying and cannot land.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.

items.colour_text: An assortment of tools useful for constructing and repairing artillery on the field.

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Artillery (minimum 1)
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +12% after winning a battle

items.colour_text: A gem imbued with wards, gifted to Shi-Hong by his dragon lords for his loyalty and service. Shi-Hong wears the gem in an amulet under his robes.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +12% after winning a battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Though blind, Shi-Hong can create weapons masterfully, far better than those with sight. His works are highly regarded as both practical and beautiful.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

Missile Resistance: +10% for Sky-junk units
	(Hero's army)
